commit.message:
Rollup merge of #87720 - matthiaskrgr:clippy_into, r=jyn514

don't use .into() to convert types to identical types (clippy::useless_conversion)

Example:
let _x: String = String::from("hello world").into();

Rollup merge of #87720 - matthiaskrgr:clippy_into, r=jyn514

don't use .into() to convert types to identical types (clippy::useless_conversion)

Example:
let _x: String = String::from("hello world").into();

                 path: fqp[..fqp.len() - 1].join("::"),
